description.english: Have at least 5 dice classes at the same time.
description.german: Hab mindestens 5 Würfelklassen gleichzeitig.
description.french: Ayez au moins 5 classes de dés en même temps.
description.italian: Possiedi almeno 5 classi di dado diverse contemporaneamente.
description.koreana: 한 번에 최소 5개의 주사위 직업을 보유합니다
description.spanish: Ten, al menos, 5 clases de dados a la vez.
description.schinese: 同时拥有至少 5 种骰子阶级
description.tchinese: 同時擁有至少 5 種骰子階級
description.russian: Имейте не менее 5 сословий кубиков одновременно.
description.japanese: 5種類以上のダイスクラスを同時に成立させる
description.polish: Uzyskaj co najmniej 5 klas kości naraz
description.brazilian: Tenha pelo menos 5 classes de Dados ao mesmo tempo.

description.english: Survive the first winter.
description.german: Überlebe den ersten Winter.
description.french: Survivez au premier hiver.
description.italian: Sopravvivi al primo inverno.
description.spanish: Sobrevive al primer invierno.
description.schinese: 活过第一个冬季
description.tchinese: 活過第一個冬季
description.japanese: 最初の冬を越える
description.brazilian: Sobreviva ao primeiro inverno.

description.english: Completely destroy an encampment.
description.german: Zerstöre ein Lager vollständig.
description.french: Détruisez complètement un campement.
description.italian: Distruggi completamente un accampamento.
description.spanish: Destruye por completo un campamento.
description.schinese: 彻底摧毁一座营地
description.tchinese: 徹底摧毀一座營地
description.japanese: 野営地を完全に破壊する
description.brazilian: Destrua completamente um acampamento.

description.english: Discover the origin of the Priests Encampment.
description.german: Entdecke den Ursprung des Priesterlagers.
description.french: Découvrez l'origine du campement de prêtres.
description.italian: Scopri le origini dell'Accampamento dei Sacerdoti.
description.spanish: Descubre el origen del campamento de religiosos.
description.schinese: 发掘牧师营地的起源
description.tchinese: 發掘牧師營地的起源
description.japanese: 神官の野営地の出自を探し出す
description.brazilian: Descubra a origem do Acampamento de Sacerdotes.

description.english: Discover the origin of the Merchants Encampment.
description.german: Entdecke den Ursprung des Händlerlagers.
description.french: Découvrez l'origine du campement de marchands.
description.italian: Scopri le origini dell'Accampamento dei Mercanti.
description.spanish: Descubre el origen del campamento mercante.
description.schinese: 发掘商人营地的起源
description.tchinese: 發掘商人營地的起源
description.japanese: 商人の野営地の出自を探し出す
description.brazilian: Descubra a origem do Acampamento dos Comerciantes.

description.english: Discover the origin of the Warriors Encampment.
description.german: Entdecke den Ursprung des Kriegerlagers.
description.french: Découvrez l'origine du campement de guerriers.
description.italian: Scopri le origini dell'Accampamento dei Guerrieri.
description.spanish: Descubre el origen del campamento de guerreros.
description.schinese: 发掘战士营地的起源
description.tchinese: 發掘戰士營地的起源
description.japanese: 戦士の野営地のの出自を探し出す
description.brazilian: Descubra a origem do Acampamento de Guerreiros.

description.english: Have 3 Pleased dice classes at the same time.
description.german: Hab 3 erfreute Würfelklassen gleichzeitig.
description.french: Ayez 3 classes de dés ravies en même temps.
description.italian: Possiedi almeno 3 classi di dado felici contemporaneamente.
description.koreana: 한 번에 3개의 기쁜 주사위 직업을 보유합니다
description.spanish: Ten 3 clases de dados complacidas a la vez.
description.schinese: 同时拥有 3 种开心的骰子阶级
description.tchinese: 同時擁有 3 種開心的骰子階級
description.japanese: 大満足のダイスクラスを3種類同時に成立させる
description.brazilian: Possua 3 classes de Dados com Satisfação ao mesmo tempo.

description.english: Ascend a die.
description.german: Lass einen Würfel aufsteigen.
description.french: Exaltez un dé.
description.italian: Ascendi un dado.
description.spanish: Asciende un dado.
description.schinese: 升华一颗骰子
description.tchinese: 昇華一顆骰子
description.japanese: ダイスを昇華させる
description.brazilian: Eleve um Dado.

description.english: Fully explore a ruin.
description.german: Erkunde eine Ruine vollständig.
description.french: Explorez une ruine dans son intégralité.
description.italian: Esplora completamente una rovina.
description.spanish: Explora una ruina por completo.
description.schinese: 彻底探索一处废墟
description.tchinese: 徹底探索一處廢墟
description.japanese: 遺跡をくまなく探検する
description.brazilian: Explore totalmente uma ruína.

description.english: Unlock all the original rulers.
description.german: Schalte alle ursprünglichen Herrscher frei.
description.french: Débloquez tous les dirigeants de base.
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i sovrani originali.
description.spanish: Desbloquea a todos los gobernantes originales.
description.schinese: 解锁所有的原始统治者
description.tchinese: 解鎖所有的原始統治者
description.japanese: 元の統治者をすべてアンロックする
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os governantes originais.

description.english: Obtain a Construct Die.
description.german: Erhalte einen Konstruktwürfel.
description.french: Obtenez un dé façonné.
description.italian: Ottieni un Dado Costrutto.
description.spanish: Obtén un dado forjado.
description.schinese: 获得一颗构造骰子
description.tchinese: 獲得一顆構造骰子
description.japanese: 組立ダイスを獲得する
description.brazilian: Obtenha um Dado Combinado.

description.english: Have a die with all faces of different classes.
description.german: Hab einen Würfel, bei dem jede Seite einer anderen Klasse angehört.
description.french: Ayez un dé dont chaque face est d'une classe différente.
description.italian: Ottieni un dado costrutto con tutte le facce appartenenti a classi diverse.
description.koreana: 모든 면의 직업이 다 다른 주사위를 보유합니다
description.spanish: Ten un dado con todas las caras de clases diferentes.
description.schinese: 拥有一颗每一面都是不同阶级的骰子
description.tchinese: 擁有一顆每一面都是不同階級的骰子
description.russian: Получите кубик, у которого все грани принадлежат разным сословиям.
description.japanese: すべて異なるクラスの目のダイスを所有する
description.polish: Uzyskaj kość, w której każda ze ścianek jest innej klasy
description.brazilian: Possua um Dado com uma classe diferente em cada lado.

description.english: Get a construct die with at least one face at maximum power.
description.german: Erhalte einen Konstruktwürfel, bei dem mindestens eine Seite maximale Kraft hat.
description.french: Obtenez un dé façonné dont au moins une des faces est à la puissance maximale.
description.italian: Ottieni un dado costrutto con almeno una faccia con la forza al massimo.
description.koreana: 최소 한 면의 능력이 최대인 건설 주사위를 보유합니다
description.spanish: Obtén un dado forjado con, al menos, una cara de poder máximo.
description.schinese: 获得一颗至少有一面具有最大力量的构造骰子
description.tchinese: 獲得一顆至少有一面具有最大力量的構造骰子
description.russian: Получите кубик-Конструкт с хотя бы одной гранью максимальной силы.
description.japanese: 組立ダイスの目を1つ以上最大パワーにする
description.polish: Zdobądź konstrukt z co najmniej jedną ścianką o maksymalnej mocy.
description.brazilian: Obtenha um Dado Combinado com pelo menos um lado com poder máximo.

description.english: Have 12 frozen dice at the same time.
description.german: Hab 12 gefrorene Würfel gleichzeitig.
description.french: Ayez 12 dés gelés en même temps.
description.italian: Possiedi 12 dadi congelati contemporaneamente.
description.spanish: Ten 12 dados congelados a la vez.
description.schinese: 同时拥有 12 颗冻结的骰子
description.tchinese: 同時擁有 12 顆凍結的骰子
description.japanese: 凍結ダイスを12個同時に所有する
description.brazilian: Possua 12 Dados congelados ao mesmo tempo.

description.english: Have at least 5 buildings on fire at the same time.
description.german: Hab mindestens 5 brennende Gebäude gleichzeitig.
description.french: Ayez au moins 5 bâtiments en feu en même temps.
description.italian: Possiedi almeno 5 strutture in fiamme contemporaneamente.
description.koreana: 한 번에 불타는 건물을 최소 5개 보유합니다
description.spanish: Ten 5 edificios quemándose a la vez.
description.schinese: 同时至少有 5 座建筑物着火
description.tchinese: 同時至少有 5 座建築物著火
description.japanese: 建物5軒以上で同時に火災を発生させる
description.polish: Uzyskaj co najmniej 5 płonących budynków naraz
description.brazilian: Possua pelo menos 5 construções pegando fogo ao mesmo tempo.

description.english: Have at least one corrupt face on everyone of your dice.
description.german: Hab mindestens eine verderbte Seite an jedem deiner Würfel.
description.french: Ayez au moins une face corrompue sur chacun de vos dés.
description.italian: Possiedi almeno una faccia corrotta su ciascuno dei tuoi dadi.
description.koreana: 보유한 모든 주사위에 부패한 면이 최소 1개씩 있습니다
description.spanish: Ten, al menos, una cara corrupta en todos tus dados.
description.schinese: 每颗骰子都至少有一个腐化骰面
description.tchinese: 每顆骰子都至少有一個腐化骰面
description.russian: Имейте не менее одной поражённой грани на каждом из кубиков.
description.japanese: どのダイスにも、1つ以上腐敗した目がある状態にする
description.polish: Uzyskaj co najmniej po jednej zdeprawowanej ściance na każdej ze swoich kości
description.brazilian: Possua pelo menos um lado corrompido em todos os seus Dados.

displayName.japanese: オクトーバーフェスト

description.english: Hold a festival for at least 3 different dice classes at the same time.
description.german: Veranstalte ein Fest für mindestens 3 verschiedene Würfelklassen gleichzeitig.
description.french: Organisez un festival pour au moins 3 classes de dés différentes en même temps.
description.italian: Dai delle feste per almeno 3 classi di dado differenti contemporaneamente.
description.koreana: 한 번에 최소 3개의 주사위 직업에 대해 축제를 엽니다
description.spanish: Celebra un festival para, al menos, 3 clases de dados diferentes a la vez.
description.schinese: 同时为至少 3 种不同的骰子阶级举办庆典
description.tchinese: 同時為至少 3 種不同的骰子階級舉辦慶典
description.russian: Устройте фестиваль как минимум 3 разным сословиям кубиков одновременно.
description.japanese: 一度に異なる3種類のダイスクラスのために祝祭を開く
description.polish: Zorganizuj festiwal dla co najmniej 3 różnych klas kości naraz
description.brazilian: Realize um festival para ao menos 3 classes de Dados diferentes ao mesmo tempo.

description.english: Have a mill surrounded by 6 farms.
description.german: Hab eine Mühle, die von 6 Höfen umgeben ist.
description.french: Ayez un moulin entouré de 6 fermes.
description.italian: Possiedi un mulino circondato da 6 campi di grano.
description.spanish: Construye 6 granjas alrededor de un molino.
description.schinese: 拥有一座被 6 块田地围绕的磨坊
description.tchinese: 擁有一座被 6 塊田地圍繞的磨坊
description.japanese: 6つの農場に囲まれた風車小屋を所有する
description.brazilian: Possua um moinho cercado por 6 fazendas.

description.english: Have at least 3 workshops active at the same time.
description.german: Hab mindestens 3 aktive Werkstätten gleichzeitig.
description.french: Ayez au moins 3 ateliers actifs en même temps.
description.italian: Possiedi almeno 3 Officine di Ricerca attive contemporaneamente.
description.koreana: 한 번에 활성화된 학술원을 최소 3개 보유합니다
description.spanish: Ten, al menos, 3 talleres activos a la vez.
description.schinese: 同时拥有至少 3 座运作中的工场
description.tchinese: 同時擁有至少 3 座運作中的工坊
description.russian: Имейте не менее 3 активных мастерских одновременно.
description.japanese: 3つ以上の作業場を同時に所有する
description.polish: Uzyskaj co najmniej 3 aktywne warsztaty naraz
description.brazilian: Possua pelo menos 3 oficinas ativas ao mesmo tempo.

displayName.brazilian: Escute o que tenho a dizer

description.english: Prevent a riot.
description.german: Verhindere einen Aufstand.
description.french: Empêchez une révolte.
description.italian: Ferma una rivolta.
description.spanish: Evita una revuelta.
description.schinese: 阻止一场暴动
description.tchinese: 阻止一場暴動
description.japanese: 暴動を防ぐ
description.brazilian: Impeça uma revolta.

description.english: Unlock all achievements.
description.german: Schalte alle Erfolge frei.
description.french: Débloquez tous les succès.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli Achievements.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los logros.
description.schinese: 解锁全部的成就
description.tchinese: 解鎖全部的成就
description.japanese: すべてのアチーブメントをアンロックする
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as conquistas.

description.english: Have at least 30 gold.
description.german: Besitze mindestens 30 Gold.
description.french: Possédez au moins 30 or.
description.italian: Possiedi almeno 30 oro.
description.spanish: Ten, al menos, 30 de oro.
description.schinese: 拥有至少 30 份黄金
description.tchinese: 擁有至少 30 份黃金
description.japanese: ゴールドを30個以上所持する
description.brazilian: Tenha pelo menos 30 de ouro.

description.german: Gewinne ein Spiel als der gestrandete König.
description.french: Gagnez une partie en tant que Roi échoué.
description.italian: Vinci una partita giocando come il Re Naufragato.
description.spanish: Gana una partida como el Rey Varado.

description.tchinese: 作為落難國王在一場遊戲中獲勝

description.english: Find the source of the attacks.
description.german: Finde den Ausgangsort für die Angriffe.
description.french: Trouvez la source des attaques.
description.italian: Scopri la fonte degli attacchi.
description.spanish: Encuentra el origen de los ataques.
description.schinese: 找出攻击的源头
description.tchinese: 找出攻擊的源頭
description.japanese: どこから攻撃が来ているか突き止める

description.english: Destroy the Harbor on Pacifist or higher.
description.german: Zerstöre den Hafen auf „Pazifist“ oder höher.
description.french: Détruisez le port en difficulté Pacifiste ou plus.
description.italian: Distruggi il Porto a difficoltà Pacifica o superiore.
description.spanish: Destruye el puerto en dificultad pacifista o mayor.
description.schinese: 以和平主义或更高难度摧毁港口
description.tchinese: 以和平主義或更高難度摧毀港口
description.russian: Разрушьте Гавань на уровне сложности «Пацифист» или выше.
description.japanese: パシフィスト以上で港を破壊する
description.polish: Zniszcz przystań na poziomie Pacyfista lub wyższym.
description.brazilian: Destrua o Porto na dificuldade Pacifista ou superior.

description.english: Destroy the Harbor on Standard difficulty or higher.
description.german: Zerstöre den Hafen auf „Standard“ oder höher.
description.french: Détruisez le port en difficulté Standard ou plus.
description.italian: Distruggi il Porto a difficoltà Normale o superiore.
description.spanish: Destruye el puerto en dificultad estándar o mayor.
description.schinese: 以标准或更高难度摧毁港口
description.tchinese: 以標準或更高難度摧毀港口
description.russian: Разрушьте Гавань на уровне сложности «Стандарт» или выше.
description.japanese: 難易度スタンダード以上で港を破壊する
description.polish: Zniszcz przystań na poziomie trudności Standard lub wyższym
description.brazilian: Destrua o Porto na dificuldade Padrão ou superior.

description.english: Destroy the Harbor on Legacy difficulty or higher.
description.german: Zerstöre den Hafen auf „Vermächtnis“ oder höher.

description.tchinese: 以傳承或更高難度摧毀港口

description.polish: Zniszcz przystań na poziomie trudności Spuścizna lub wyższym

description.tchinese: 以困難或更高難度摧毀港口

description.polish: Zniszcz przystań na poziomie trudności Trudny lub wyższym
description.brazilian: Destrua o Porto na dificuldade Difícil ou superior.

displayName.italian: Il Fato è contro di noi

description.english: Destroy the Harbor on Extreme difficulty.
description.german: Zerstöre den Hafen auf „Extrem“.
description.french: Détruisez le port en difficulté Extrême ou plus.
description.italian: Distruggi il Porto a difficoltà Estrema.
description.spanish: Destruye el puerto en dificultad extrema.

description.tchinese: 以極端難度摧毀港口

description.japanese: 難易度エクストリーム以上で港を破壊する
description.polish: Zniszcz przystań na poziomie trudności Ekstremum
description.brazilian: Destrua o Porto na dificuldade Tormenta.

description.english: Complete The Great Winter on Standard difficulty or higher.
description.german: Schließe „Der Lange Winter“ auf „Standard“ oder höher ab.
description.french: Terminez Le Grand hiver en difficulté Standard ou plus.
description.italian: Completa Il Grande Inverno a difficoltà Standard o superiore.
description.koreana: 스탠다드 이상의 난이도에서 혹독한 겨울을 완료합니다
description.spanish: Completa El gran invierno en dificultad estándar o mayor.
description.schinese: 以标准或更高难度完成严冬
description.tchinese: 以標準或更高難度完成嚴冬
description.russian: Пройдите сценарий «Великая зима» на сложности «Стандарт» или выше.
description.japanese: 難易度スタンダード以上で大いなる冬を完了する
description.polish: Ukończ zadanie Wielka zima na poziomie trudności Standard lub wyższym.
description.brazilian: Conclua O grande inverno na dificuldade Padrão ou superior.

description.tchinese: 以標準或更高難度完成大城市

description.brazilian: Conclua Metrópole na dificuldade Padrão ou superior.

description.brazilian: Conclua

description.english: Complete Ice and Fire on Standard difficulty or higher.
description.german: Schließe „Eis und Feuer“ auf „Standard“ oder höher ab.
description.french: Terminez De glace et de feu en difficulté Standard ou plus.
description.italian: Completa Ghiaccio e Fuoco a difficoltà Standard o superiore.
description.koreana: 스탠다드 이상의 난이도에서 얼음과 불을 완료합니다
description.spanish: Completa Hielo y fuego en dificultad estándar o mayor.
description.schinese: 以标准或更高难度完成冰与火
description.tchinese: 以標準或更高難度完成冰與火

description.polish: Ukończ zadanie Lód i ogień na poziomie trudności Standard lub wyższym.
description.brazilian: Conclua Gelo e fogo na dificuldade Padrão ou superior.

description.english: Complete Six Faces on Standard difficulty or higher.
description.german: Schließe „Sechs Seiten“ auf „Standard“ oder höher ab.
description.french: Terminez Six faces en difficulté Standard ou plus.
description.italian: Completa Sei Facce a difficoltà Standard o superiore.
description.spanish: Completa Seis caras en dificultad estándar o mayor.
description.schinese: 以标准或更高难度完成六面骰
description.tchinese: 以標準或更高難度完成六面骰
description.russian: Пройдите сценарий «Шесть граней» на сложности «Стандарт» или выше.

description.brazilian: Conclua Seis lados na dificuldade Padrão ou superior.

description.english: As a Stranded King reach the true ending without starting with any ascended dice on Legacy difficulty or higher.
description.german: Erreiche auf „Vermächtnis“ oder höher das wahre Ende als gestrandeter König, ohne mit einem aufgestiegenen Würfel zu beginnen.
description.french: En tant que Roi échoué, obtenez la vraie fin en commençant sans dé exalté, en difficulté Original ou plus.
description.italian: Giocando come Il Re Naufragato raggiungi il vero finale senza iniziare con alcun dado asceso a difficoltà Legacy o superiore.
description.koreana: 레거시 이상의 난이도에서 궁지에 처한 왕으로서 승급 주사위 없이 시작해 진 엔딩에 도달합니다
description.spanish: Obtén el final verdadero como el Rey Varado sin haber empezado con dados ascendidos en dificultad clásica o mayor.
description.schinese: 以传承或更高难度在不使用任何升华骰子开始游戏的情况下，作为落难国王达到真正结局
description.tchinese: 以傳承或更高難度在不使用任何昇華骰子開始遊戲的情況下，作為落難國王達到真正結局
description.russian: Играя Королём на мели, достигните истинной концовки на сложности «Наследие» или выше, не взяв с собой вознесённых кубиков на старте.
description.japanese: 難易度レガシー以上で開始時に昇華ダイスを使わず、漂着の王として真のエンディングに到達する
description.polish: Jako Ocalały król dotrzyj do prawdziwego zakończenia, nie mając na początku żadnych wywyższonych kości na poziomie trudności Spuścizna lub wyższym
description.brazilian: Como Rei Náufrago, alcance o final verdadeiro sem iniciar com Dados Elevados na dificuldade Legado ou superior.

description.english: Complete A New Leader on Pacifist or higher.
Complete Bizzarre Requirements on  on Standard difficulty or higher.
Complete Building a Following on Standard difficulty or higher.
Complete Hunted on Standard difficulty or higher.
Win a game as the Vicar.
